When a territory no longer feels defended, it can abandon itself, vote in despair. #Hirson # FH2012
Anger is there compared to globalization without rules, compared to the finance that wants to dominate us. #Hirson # FH2012
Anger is there in relation to promises that have not been kept. #Hirson # FH2012
I have the responsibility not to disappoint you! #Hirson # FH2012
Here we do not differentiate between "true" and "false" work. #Hirson # FH2012
The role of the President is to defend work for all. #Hirson # FH2012
If there is a Labor Day, it is for all workers to meet together! #Hirson # FH2012
May 1st, I will not do a meeting on the job. # 1ermai #Hirson # FH2012
It is the trade unions that must march during Labor Day! # 1ermai #Hirson # FH2012
What do we prefer? Protect the richest or protect our children? I made the choice to protect our children! #Hirson # FH2012
I send you a message of rallying and reconciliation: I need all the French. #Hirson # FH2012
Dear friends, we are going to live a great moment. I feel we are going to win the presidential election! #Hirson # FH2012
Be proud to participate in this great fight for France as a whole! #Hirson # FH2012
The victory comes, May 6, it will not be my victory, nor yours, but that of the Republic! #Hirson # FH2012

I am in a few moments the guest of the Journal of 20h of TF1. #JTHollande
Never has a socialist candidate made such a score in a presidential election, except for F. Mitterrand, outgoing, in 1988. #JTHollande
What drives me is consistency and consistency. I will not change. #JTHollande
What the French want is a President who is on course, not a whirlwind. #JTHollande
I am for regularization on a case by case basis, with the same criteria everywhere in France. #JTHollande
Immigration must not be a subject of division. #JTHollande
I will fight, more than today, against clandestine channels. #Immigration #JTHollande
I proposed the right to vote to foreigners present for several years in the territory, in local elections. #JTHollande
There will be a revaluation of the SMIC. #JTHollande
Those with the 41 years of contributions will be able to retire at age 60. This will cost 0.1% of additional contributions. #JTHollande
We will set up the generation contract: http://t.co/doCx8a0O #JTHollande
N. Sarkozy is not the candidate of "real work" but that of true unemployment. #JTHollande
I want the state to be exemplary. I will report every 6 months of the activity that will be mine. #JTHollande
A number of nominations will be submitted for assent to the parliamentary committees. #JTHollande
Budget serious yes, austerity for life, no! #Europe #JTHollande
My first trip will be to Berlin, to confirm to Angela Merkel the vote of the French for another Europe. #JTHollande

I wanted to address at the beginning of campaign second round to the French. # FH6mai
The first round considerably mobilized the French. # FH6mai
The French, 28.6% of them, put me in the lead. This is the best result of a socialist candidate for a long time! # FH6mai
The total left-wing vote is at a higher level than in 2007 and 2002. # FH6may
All this confirms the failure of the incumbent who arrives not only second, but 5 points below his result in 2007. # FH6may
Never had an outgoing President, a candidate for his own reelection, been in this situation. # FH6mai
There is a desire for change that expresses itself. My duty is to translate this will! # FH6mai
All this creates a need for efficiency for the next President. What he says will have concrete translations. # FH6mai
The participation of the sheikhs of the tribes of North Sinai in the mass conference of "Dr. Mohamed Morsi" http://t.co/2HFLaR04
A demand of truth as well the broken promises generated anger. # FH6mai
A requirement of justice because there is in the pronounced votes, there is this claim of equality. # FH6mai
A requirement of exemplarity at the top of the state, that at the highest level, restraint, reserve, economy of speech can be the rule.
The victory must be that of a new Europe. # FH6mai
France will not find its place in the European Union if it is able to influence the course of the European construction. # FH6mai
Without growth, there will be no opportunity for Europe to achieve its objectives and emerge from the eurozone crisis. # FH6mai
In the aftermath of the poll, if I have received a mandate, I will send a memorandum to the Heads of State on the renegotiation of the treaty. # FH6mai
This memorandum will include the creation of euro bonds. # FH6mai
We will further free the possibility of financing by the European Investment Bank. ## FH6mai
We will create a tax on financial transactions. #Europe # FH6may
To this memorandum will be added a dialogue necessary to counter any resumption of speculation in Europe. # FH6mai
The French have the choice between two conceptions of the Republic. # FH6mai
There is a cleavage that is added to all the others: the outgoing candidate wants to divide, oppose, separate. I want to gather the French. # FH6mai
A five-year term is often judged at the beginning and is sanctioned at the end. # FH6mai
Nicolas Sarkozy said, in 2008, to be for the right to vote foreigners in local elections, as "intellectual". # FH6mai
The right to vote for foreigners in local elections is one of my 60 commitments. # FH6mai
I believe that the next five years should reverse the unemployment curve. # FH6mai

It is important to organize this meeting, every 6 months, between the press and the President. # FH6mai

France will be confident with the current leadership of the United States. # FH6mai
